trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for components that provide design-time support in a designer host for Web server controls that are derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma classe base para componentes que fornecem suporte de tempo de design em um host de designer para o servidor Web controles que derivam de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: In a designer host, when the user switches from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> abstract class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Em um host designer, quando o usuário alterna da origem para o modo de Design, o código de origem de marcação que descreve um controle derivado de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>classe abstrata é analisada e uma versão de tempo de design do controle é criada na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: When the user switches back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Quando o usuário alternar de volta à exibição da fonte, o controle de tempo de design é persistido no código-fonte marcação e editado na marcação da página da Web.

trans-unit.source: The BaseDataListDesigner abstract class serves as a base class for components that provide design-time support for controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> in a designer host.
trans-unit.target: A classe abstrata BaseDataListDesigner serve como uma classe base para componentes que fornecem suporte de tempo de design para controles que derivam de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>em um host designer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: The BaseDataListDesigner class properties provide the following functionality: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades da classe BaseDataListDesigner fornecerem a seguinte funcionalidade: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.ActionLists%2A>propriedade retorna um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>objeto, que normalmente contém um objeto que é derivado do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>classe para cada nível na árvore de herança do designer.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataKeyField%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> properties provide access to the corresponding properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataKeyField%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A>propriedades fornecem acesso às propriedades correspondentes do controle associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataKeyField%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceDesigner%2A> property provides access to the designer of the data source of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceDesigner%2A>propriedade fornece acesso para o designer da fonte de dados do controle associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceDesigner%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DesignerView%2A> property gets the default view of the data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DesignerView%2A>propriedade obtém o modo de exibição padrão da fonte de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DesignerView%2A>

trans-unit.source: The BaseDataListDesigner class methods provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Os métodos da classe BaseDataListDesigner fornecerem a seguinte funcionalidade: - o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A>método prepara o designer para exibir, editar e criar o controle associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.InvokePropertyBuilder%2A> method invokes a component editor for the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.InvokePropertyBuilder%2A>método invoca um editor de componente para o controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.InvokePropertyBuilder%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method is used to add, remove, or shadow design-time properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>método é usado para adicionar, remover ou propriedades de tempo de design do controle associado de sombra.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A> method generates an object that can be used as a data source at design time.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A>método gera um objeto que pode ser usado como uma fonte de dados em tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method gets the data source from the container of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>método obtém a fonte de dados do contêiner do controle associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A> method gets the data source from the control container, resolved to a specific data member.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A>método obtém a fonte de dados do contêiner de controle, resolvido para um membro de dados específico.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetTemplateContainerDataSource%2A> method gets the data source of the template container.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetTemplateContainerDataSource%2A>método obtém a fonte de dados do recipiente de modelo.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetTemplateContainerDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method is called when there is a change to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>método é chamado quando há uma alteração para o controle associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method is called when the associated control data source has changed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>método é chamado quando a fonte de dados do controle associado foi alterado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> method is called when the schema of the associated control data source changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A>método é chamado quando as alterações de esquema da fonte de dados de controle associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A> method is called when an automatic formatting scheme has been applied.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A>método é chamado quando um esquema de formatação automática tiver sido aplicado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnStylesChanged%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged%2A> methods can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when an associated control style has changed or when the designer template-editing verbs have changed, respectively.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnStylesChanged%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged%2A>métodos podem ser substituídos para implementar a funcionalidade que deve ocorrer quando um estilo de controle associado foi alterado ou quando os verbos do designer de edição do modelo foram alterados, respectivamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnStylesChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnPropertyBuilder%2A> method handles the property-builder event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnPropertyBuilder%2A>método manipula o evento do criador de propriedades.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnPropertyBuilder%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> class when it creates the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>classe quando ele cria o controle associado que é derivado do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>classe ou uma cópia desse controle na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer action list collection for this designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de lista de ação de designer para este designer.

trans-unit.source: The ActionLists property creates an empty <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object and adds the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> that is returned by the ActionLists base property to this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ActionLists cria vazio <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>e o adiciona a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>que é retornada pela propriedade base ActionLists a este <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>objeto.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>

trans-unit.source: Then it adds it to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, and then returns this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, ele adiciona o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>de objeto e, em seguida, retorna essa <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>objeto.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> associado a este designer.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the data key field of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor do campo de chave de dados do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The DataKeyField property provides access from the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A> property of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DataKeyField fornece acesso do designer para a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>propriedade do controle associado que é derivado da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>classe</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> de</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A> indicates the primary key of the data source that is bound to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>indica a chave primária da fonte de dados que está associado ao controle associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField*> value of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField*>valor do controle associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the data member field of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor do campo de membro de dados do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The DataMember property provides access from the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> property of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DataMember fornece acesso do designer para a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>propriedade do controle associado que é derivado da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>classe</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> de</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> indicates the table or element of the data source that is bound to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>indica a tabela ou um elemento da fonte de dados que está associado ao controle associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember*> value of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember*>valor do controle associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the data source property of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor da propriedade de fonte de dados do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The DataSource property provides access from the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> property of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de fonte de dados fornece acesso do designer para a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>propriedade do controle associado que é derivado da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>classe</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> de</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*> value of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*>valor do controle associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer of the data source, when one is selected for data binding.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o designer da fonte de dados, quando um é selecionado para associação de dados.

trans-unit.source: The DataSourceDesigner property returns the designer for the data source of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DataSourceDesigner retorna o designer da fonte de dados do que é derivado da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>classe</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> de controle associado

trans-unit.source: The designer object implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
trans-unit.target: O objeto designer implementa o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner>interface.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The designer for the data source of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O designer da fonte de dados do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the designer's version of the data source ID property and is used to shadow the corresponding property of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a versão do designer da propriedade de ID da fonte de dados e é usado para a propriedade correspondente do controle associado de sombra.

trans-unit.source: Setting the designer's DataSourceID property causes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the associated control to be set.
trans-unit.target: Definir causas de propriedade DataSourceID do designer de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade do controle associado a ser definido.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the DataSourceID is set to a <xref:System.String>, indicating a new data source is to be defined, a **Create Data Source** dialog box is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Se a DataSourceID for definida como um <xref:System.String>, indicando uma nova fonte de dados deve ser definido, um **criar fonte de dados** caixa de diálogo é exibida.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: If the DataSourceID is set to a <xref:System.String> indicating there is no data source, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> is set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Se a DataSourceID for definida como um <xref:System.String>indicando que não há nenhuma fonte de dados, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A>é definido como uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("").</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that is the data source ID of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que é a ID da fonte de dados do controle associado.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the default view of the data source that is bound to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a exibição padrão da fonte de dados que está associado ao controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The DesignerView property gets the default view of the data source that is bound to the associated control by passing the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> property to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> object.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DesignerView obtém o modo de exibição padrão da fonte de dados que está associado ao controle associado, passando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>propriedade para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A>método o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no view is returned or the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> property is not set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> is used to get the view names and the first view name is used to get the default view.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum modo de exibição for retornado ou o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>propriedade não for definida, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A>método do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>é usado para obter o modo de exibição nomes e o primeiro nome de exibição é usado para obter o modo de exibição padrão.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"></xref> representing the default view of the data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"> </xref> que representa o modo de exibição padrão da fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the designer and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo designer e, opcionalmente, libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: If the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class has a <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> property that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> interface, the Dispose method disconnects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.LoadComplete> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> object.
trans-unit.target: Se um controle associado que é derivado do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>classe tem um <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A>propriedade que implementa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>interface, o método Dispose desconecta o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.LoadComplete>eventos do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.LoadComplete> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> method, the Dispose disconnects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved> events.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A>implementa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>desconecta do método, o descarte de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>, e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved>eventos.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose also disconnects the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed> events of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> object.
trans-unit.target: O descarte também desconecta o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged>e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed>eventos o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged>

trans-unit.source: It finally calls the Dispose base method.
trans-unit.target: Finalmente, ele chama o método base Dispose.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Generates an object that can be used as a data source at design time.
trans-unit.target: Gera um objeto que pode ser usado como uma fonte de dados em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeDataSource method attempts to construct a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object from the data source that is defined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O método GetDesignTimeDataSource tenta construir um <xref:System.Data.DataTable>objeto da fonte de dados definida pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: If this is not possible, it creates a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> from dummy data.
trans-unit.target: Se isso não for possível, ele cria um <xref:System.Data.DataTable>de dados fictícios.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of rows of sample data that the data source should contain.
trans-unit.target: O número mínimo de linhas de dados de exemplo que a fonte de dados deve conter.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the returned data source contains dummy data; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the returned data source contains data from an actual data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a fonte de dados retornados contiver dados fictícios; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se a fonte de dados retornados contiver dados de uma fonte de dados reais.

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface that serves as a data source for use at design time.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>interface que serve como uma fonte de dados para uso em tempo de design.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Generates an object that can be used as a data source at design time.
trans-unit.target: Gera um objeto que pode ser usado como uma fonte de dados em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeDataSource method attempts to construct a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object from the data source that is specified by the `selectedDataSource` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O método GetDesignTimeDataSource tenta construir um <xref:System.Data.DataTable>objeto da fonte de dados que é especificado pelo `selectedDataSource` parâmetro.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: If this is not possible, it creates a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> from dummy data.
trans-unit.target: Se isso não for possível, ele cria um <xref:System.Data.DataTable>de dados fictícios.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> that is used as a template for the data format.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>que é usado como um modelo para o formato de dados.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of rows of sample data that the data source data should contain.
trans-unit.target: O número mínimo de linhas de dados de exemplo que os dados da fonte de dados devem conter.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the returned data source contains dummy data; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the returned data source contains data from an actual data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a fonte de dados retornados contiver dados fictícios; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se a fonte de dados retornados contiver dados de uma fonte de dados reais.

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface that serves as a data source for use at design time.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>interface que serve como uma fonte de dados para uso em tempo de design.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Gets the data source component from the associated control container, resolved to a specific data member.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o componente de fonte de dados do contêiner de controle associado, resolvido para um membro de dados específico.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method to construct a data source from the object that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> properties of the associated control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>método usa o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>método para construir uma fonte de dados do que é especificado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>e as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>Propriedades do controle associado derivado da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>classe</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> de</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> objeto</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface containing the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*> of the associated control, resolved to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember*> parameter; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if a data source is not found.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>que contém o tempo de design de interface <> </> *> do controle associado, resolvido para o <> </> *> parâmetro; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se uma fonte de dados não foi encontrada.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Gets the data source component from the associated control container.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o componente de fonte de dados do contêiner de controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The GetSelectedDataSource method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to construct a data source from the object that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> property of the associated control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: O método GetSelectedDataSource usa o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para construir uma fonte de dados do que é especificado pela <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>propriedade do controle associado derivado da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>classe</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> de</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> objeto</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface containing the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*> property of the associated control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if a data source is not found.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>que contém o tempo de design de interface <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*>propriedade do controle associado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se uma fonte de dados não foi encontrada.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Gets the data source of the template's container.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a fonte de dados do contêiner modelo.

trans-unit.source: The GetTemplateContainerDataSource method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A> method to construct a data source from the object that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> properties of the associated control derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: O método GetTemplateContainerDataSource chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A>método para construir uma fonte de dados do objeto que é especificado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>e as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>Propriedades do controle associado derivado da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that specifies the name of the template for which to get the data source.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que especifica o nome do modelo para o qual obter a fonte de dados.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: An object that implements an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface containing a design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*> property.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>que contém um tempo de design de interface <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Prepara o designer para exibir, editar e criar o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The designer host calls the Initialize method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: O host de designer chama o método Initialize quando ele estiver pronto para usar o designer para renderizar o controle que é derivado da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>classe</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> de

trans-unit.source: The Initialize method and its base methods configure properties and connect to events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
trans-unit.target: O método Initialize e seus métodos base configurem propriedades e conecte-se para eventos que são necessários para a operação do designer.

trans-unit.source: The Initialize connects to the design-time data source and updates the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: A inicialização conecta-se à fonte de dados de tempo de design e atualiza a marcação de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> property implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> interface, the Initialize connects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved> events.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A>propriedade implementa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>a inicialização de interface, conecta o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>, e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved>eventos.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `component` parameter is the control, derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>, that is associated with this designer, or a copy of that control.
trans-unit.target: O `component` parâmetro é o controle derivado a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>, que é associado a este designer ou uma cópia desse controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: A control derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"></xref>, which implements an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um controle é derivado de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"> </xref>, que implementa um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Invokes a component editor for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Invoca um editor de componente para o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The InvokePropertyBuilder method creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor> or <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor> object, and then invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> method of the component editor.
trans-unit.target: O método InvokePropertyBuilder cria um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor>do objeto e, em seguida, invoca o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A>método do editor do componente.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor>

trans-unit.source: The index of the page with which to initialize the component editor.
trans-unit.target: O índice da página com a qual inicializar o editor de componentes.

trans-unit.source: Handles the <xref uid="langword_csharp_AutoFormat" name="AutoFormat" href=""></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Manipula o <xref uid="langword_csharp_AutoFormat" name="AutoFormat" href=""> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The OnAutoFormat method is obsolete and has no functionality.
trans-unit.target: O método OnAutoFormat está obsoleto e não tem nenhuma funcionalidade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>que gerou o evento.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>objeto que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Called when an automatic formatting scheme has been applied to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando um esquema de formatação automática foi aplicado para o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The OnAutoFormatApplied method is called when a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> object is applied to the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: O método OnAutoFormatApplied é chamado quando um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>objeto é aplicado para o controle associado, que é derivado da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>classe</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> de</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> object defines a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatStyle> object that is applied to the control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>objeto define uma <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatStyle>objeto que é aplicado ao controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>

trans-unit.source: A designer can override the OnAutoFormatApplied to inspect properties of the control or to take some other action.
trans-unit.target: Um designer pode substituir OnAutoFormatApplied para inspecionar propriedades do controle ou executar alguma outra ação.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat"></xref> object that defines a style.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat"> </xref> objeto que define um estilo.

trans-unit.source: Called when there is a change to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando há uma alteração para o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The OnComponentChanged method is called when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> event of a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class executes.
trans-unit.target: O método OnComponentChanged é chamado quando o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>eventos de um controle que é derivado do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>classe executa.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is in response to a property change on the control (for example, a **Properties** grid change).
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, isso é em resposta a uma alteração de propriedade do controle (por exemplo, um **propriedades** alteração de grade).

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A> object to which the control is bound is changed, the control is redrawn on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A>objeto ao qual o controle está associado é alterado, o controle é redesenhado na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that is the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>que é a origem do evento.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando a fonte de dados para o controle associado é alterado.

trans-unit.source: The OnDataSourceChanged base method connects the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class to the current data source, and if that is different from the data source to which the control was connected, the method updates the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: O método base OnDataSourceChanged conecta-se que é derivado do controle associado a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>classe à fonte de dados atual, e se for diferente da fonte de dados ao qual o controle foi conectado, o método atualiza a marcação de tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the property-builder event.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipula o evento do criador de propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The OnPropertyBuilder method invokes a component editor for the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: O método OnPropertyBuilder invoca um editor de componente para o controle associado que é derivado da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>classe</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> de

trans-unit.source: It creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor> or <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor> object, and then invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> method of the component editor.
trans-unit.target: Ele cria um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor>do objeto e, em seguida, invoca o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A>método do editor do componente.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that is the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que é a origem do evento.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>objeto que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Called when the schema of the data source for the associated control changes.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando as alterações de esquema da fonte de dados para o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: Unless the designer is in template-editing mode or a field is being added or edited, the OnSchemaRefreshed method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A> method, which in turn calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method to update the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> control to reflect the data source change.
trans-unit.target: A menos que o designer estiver no modo de edição de modelo ou um campo está sendo adicionado ou editado, chamadas de método OnSchemaRefreshed o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A>método, que por sua vez chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>para atualizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>controle para refletir a alteração da fonte de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A>

trans-unit.source: Can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when a style of the associated control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Pode ser substituído para implementar a funcionalidade que deve ocorrer quando um estilo do controle associado foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: The OnStylesChanged method can serve as notification that a style of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class has changed.
trans-unit.target: O método OnStylesChanged pode servir como a notificação de que um estilo de associado controle que é derivada de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>classe mudou.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: Can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when the designer template-editing verbs have changed.
trans-unit.target: Pode ser substituído para implementar a funcionalidade que deve ocorrer quando os verbos do designer de edição do modelo foram alterados.

trans-unit.source: The OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged method can be implemented to perform additional processing, such recording that a change has occurred, when the template-editing verbs change.
trans-unit.target: O método OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged pode ser implementado para executar o processamento adicional, como gravação que ocorreu uma alteração, quando altera os verbos de edição de modelo.

trans-unit.source: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add additional properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Usado pelo designer para remover propriedades da ou adicionar propriedades adicionais para a exibição no **propriedades** grade ou a propriedades de sombra do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: Control designers use methods that are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: Designers de controle usam métodos que são derivados do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método sombra várias propriedades de controle com as propriedades de tempo de design correspondentes que implementa o designer, e para adicionar ou remover propriedades do **propriedades** grade.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class, the PreFilterProperties creates design-time properties to shadow the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Para controles que são derivados do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>classe, o PreFilterProperties cria propriedades de tempo de design para sombra a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: A collection implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> interface of the added and shadowed properties.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção implementando um <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>interface das propriedades adicionadas e sombreadas.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.CanRefreshSchema*>.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Esse membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele pode ser usado somente quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>instância é convertida em um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider>interface.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the schema can be refreshed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o esquema pode ser atualizado; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to disable data-binding events until after the schema has been refreshed; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to enable the events.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para desabilitar eventos de associação de dados até o esquema tiver sido atualizada; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para ativar os eventos.
